8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
I am using zeronet on Tor browser (ubuntu linux) and TOR:ERROR on ZeroHello page. 
"Permission denied ... /control.authcookie". I gave permission debian-tor groop to read. Who should be control.authcookie file owner and what group what rights should have? I have modified /etc/tor/torrc as told in FAQ.

> [gnumb](#comment_3_16edBgV1G9fYMMeE84WSRG6Fji42hY1cMY): I am using zeronet on Tor browser (ubuntu linux) and TOR:ERROR on ZeroHello page."Permission denied ... /control.authcookie". I gave permission debian-tor groop to read. Who should be control.authcookie file owner and what group what rights should have? I have modified /etc/tor/torrc as told in FAQ.

Solved. Reinstaling zeronet from original site helped. https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet#user-content-how-to-join
